content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The reason we didn't agree on a final price was that the landlord was looking to charge a higher price than what I, as a student, was willing to pay. We couldn't reach a mutual agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you rate the negotiation partner as a 10?
name: Evaluator

content: I rated the negotiation partner as a 10 because despite the differences in our negotiation positions, he remained polite, respectful, and professional throughout the conversation.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
